de.tud.plt.r43ples.webservice

Class Endpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tud.plt.r43ples.webservice.Endpoint

  • @Path(value="sparql")
public class Endpoint
extends Object
    Provides SPARQL endpoint via [host]:[port]/r43ples/. Supplies version information, service description as well as SPARQL queries.
    Author:
    Stephan Hensel, Markus Graube, Xinyu Yang

    • Method Detail

      • sparqlPOST

        @POST
@Produces(value={"text/plain","text/html","application/json","application/rdf+xml","text/turtle","application/sparql-results+xml"})
@Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
public final javax.ws.rs.core.Response sparqlPOST(@FormParam(value="format")
                                                          String formatQuery,
                                                          @FormParam(value="query")@DefaultValue(value="")
                                                          String sparqlQuery,
                                                          @FormParam(value="query_rewriting")@DefaultValue(value="")
                                                          String query_rewriting)
                                           throws InternalErrorException
        HTTP POST interface for query and update (e.g. SELECT, INSERT, DELETE).
        Parameters:
        formatHeader - format specified in the HTTP header
        formatQuery - format specified in the HTTP parameters
        sparqlQuery - the SPARQL query
        query_rewriting - should query rewriting option be used
        Returns:
        HTTP response
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException

      • sparqlPOSTdirectly

        @POST
@Produces(value={"text/plain","text/html","application/json","application/rdf+xml","text/turtle","application/sparql-results+xml"})
@Consumes(value="application/sparql-query")
public final javax.ws.rs.core.Response sparqlPOSTdirectly(String sparqlQuery)
                                                   throws InternalErrorException
        HTTP POST interface for query and update (e.g. SELECT, INSERT, DELETE). Direct method (http://www.w3.org/TR/2013/REC-sparql11-protocol-20130321/#query-via-post-direct)
        Parameters:
        formatHeader - format specified in the HTTP header
        sparqlQuery - the SPARQL query specified in the HTTP POST body
        Returns:
        HTTP response
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException

      • sparqlGET

        @GET
@Produces(value={"text/plain","text/html","application/json","application/rdf+xml","text/turtle","application/sparql-results+xml"})
public final javax.ws.rs.core.Response sparqlGET(@QueryParam(value="format")
                                               String formatQuery,
                                               @QueryParam(value="query")@DefaultValue(value="")
                                               String sparqlQuery,
                                               @QueryParam(value="query_rewriting")@DefaultValue(value="")
                                               String query_rewriting)
                                          throws InternalErrorException
        HTTP GET interface for query and update (e.g. SELECT, INSERT, DELETE). Provides HTML form if no query is specified and HTML is requested Provides Service Description if no query is specified and RDF representation is requested
        Parameters:
        formatHeader - format specified in the HTTP header
        formatQuery - format specified in the HTTP parameters
        sparqlQuery - the SPARQL query
        query_rewriting - should query rewriting option be used
        Returns:
        HTTP response
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException

                               boolean query_rewriting)
                                       throws InternalErrorException
        Interface for query and update (e.g. SELECT, INSERT, DELETE). Provides HTML form if no query is specified and HTML is requested Provides Service Description if no query is specified and RDF representation is requested
        Parameters:
        format - mime type for response format
        sparqlQuery - decoded SPARQL query
        query_rewriting - should query rewriting option be used
        Returns:
        the response
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException
